summary: A prostitute, a hired killer, and a movie crew cross paths in a Venice hotel where human meat is on the menu in this freewheeling film.
cast: Max Beesley|Fabrizio Bentivoglio|Brian Bovell|Saffron Burrows|Elisabetta Cavallotti|Valentina Cervi|George DiCenzo|Andrea Di Stefano|Nicola Farron|Christopher Fulford|Valeria Golino|Jeremy Hardy|Salma Hayek|Danny Huston|Rhys Ifans|Jason Isaacs|Paco Jarana|Lucy Liu|Mark Long|Mía Maestro|John Malkovich|Chiara Mastroianni|Laura Morante|Ornella Muti|Burt Reynolds|Stefania Rocca|Julian Sands|Danny Sapani|David Schwimmer|Alexandra Staden|Mark Strong|Heathcote Williams|Eva Yerbabuena
title: Hotel
